summary: Completed comprehensive authentication testing of Sentient Tracker game community pulse app. All authentication flows working correctly including email signup/login, session management, protected routes, and user data isolation.
passed_tests: Backend API root endpoint responds correctly
Email signup creates new user with proper validation
Duplicate email signup properly rejected with 400 error
Get current user endpoint works with valid authentication
Get current user endpoint returns 401 without authentication
Email login works with existing user credentials
Invalid login properly rejected with 401 error
Logout endpoint clears session successfully
All protected game endpoints return 401 when not authenticated
Authenticated game CRUD operations working correctly
Game creation with proper user_id association
Game retrieval shows only user's games (data isolation)
Game update functionality working with authentication
Game deletion working with proper user validation
Scan functionality working for authenticated users
Scan results properly associated with user
Session token management working correctly
Login page displays with both Google and Email options
Email signup form creates user and redirects to dashboard
Email login form authenticates existing user successfully
Dashboard loads correctly after authentication
User info displayed properly in dashboard header
Protected routes redirect to login when not authenticated
Add game modal opens and form validation working
Game creation UI integrated with backend successfully
Navigation between pages working correctly
Session timeout/expiration handled properly
Authentication state management working across app
